Package edu.balboa.apcs.MineSweeper

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MakeBoard  
    MineField
    Represents a MineField which keeps track of the current game board, keeps track of the number of rows/columns the current board has, and lastly holds a method with the percents of Squares being mined.
    MineSweeper
    This class is the controller for the APCS MineSweeper app.
    MineSweeperConsole
    This class provides a very simple GUI that may *optionally* be used instead of the command-line interface.
    SampleSquare
    This class is provided to help students understand the tester setup for this application and should not be used as part of the final MineSweeper application.
    Scoreboard  
    Square
    This class represents a Square checking to see if the Square has been revealed, if it has been flagged, if it has a mine, or just to check for any mines near it.
